name: actions_delete-actions-cache-by-id
description:
Deletes a GitHub Actions cache for a repository, using a cache ID.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint.

GitHub Apps must have the `actions:write` permission to use this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

cache_id.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub Actions cache.
